description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. City Tuesday is an open world platformer game about the last five minutes before a terrorist attack. You play a man who has become stuck reliving those five minutes before the disaster.  Learn the city, track down the bombs, and possibly become unstuck from time.
description.short: City Tuesday is an open world platformer game about the last five minutes before a terrorist attack. You play a man who has become stuck reliving those five minutes before the disaster.  Learn the city, track down the bombs, and possibly become unstuck from time.
